Sentencas: For several electrode materials oxide ion incorporation into a solid electrolyte is believed to take place in a narrow zone close to the three-phase boundary (TPB).
Titulo: The determination of the three-phase boundary width of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes by current-driven 18O tracer incorporation

Sentencas: However, a determination of the width, exact location and distribution of the electrochemical activity of this incorporation zone is difficult.
Titulo: The determination of the three-phase boundary width of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes by current-driven 18O tracer incorporation

Sentencas: We discuss how far current-driven oxygen tracer experiments allow a quantification of TPB properties.
Titulo: The determination of the three-phase boundary width of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes by current-driven 18O tracer incorporation

Sentencas: The considerations are exemplified by experiments revealing the TPB width of Pt on YSZ.
Titulo: The determination of the three-phase boundary width of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes by current-driven 18O tracer incorporation
